Literature.Title: In vitro and in vivo activities of antimicrobial peptides developed using an amino acid-based activity prediction method.
Literature.Author: Wu X, Wang Z, Li X, Fan Y, He G, Wan Y, Yu C, Tang J, Li M, Zhang X, Zhang H, Xiang R, Pan Y, Liu Y, Lu L, Yang L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=64µg/ml)
